alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 12:01PM PDT until April 12 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down and allow plenty of extra time to reach your destination. Allow extra following distance between the vehicle in front of you. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
